text: This is why I absolutely LOVE Blake Shelton! Not only does he burn Adam Levine all the time, but now he ’ s throwing it Luke Bryan ’ s way! If you didn ’ t see, during a red carpet interview at the ACMs Luke Bryan was asked if he would officiate Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton ’ s wedding if they end up getting married, and he said gladly.
